generic_long_table.section:
Hexadecimal content.
Generic table with binary payload of long sections, to be used when a specific table is not yet implemented. The body of the section elements shall contain an even number of hexadecimal digits, the payload of the long section. The CRC32 field is not part of this payload, it will be recomputed.
The private indicator shall be false on MPEG-defined sections and preferably true on DVB-defined and user-defined sections.

_tables.generic_short_table:
Hexadecimal content.
Generic table with binary payload of one short section, to be used when a specific table is not yet implemented. The body of this element shall contain an even number of hexadecimal digits, the payload of the short section.
The private indicator shall be false on MPEG-defined sections and preferably true on DVB-defined and user-defined sections.

splice_event.out_of_network: bool, required when splice_event_cancel is false
splice_event.utc_splice_time: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss or uint32, required when splice_event_cancel is false and program_splice_flag is to be set
splice_event.unique_program_id: uint16, required when splice_event_cancel is false

splice_insert.out_of_network: bool, required when splice_event_cancel is false
splice_insert.pts_time: uint33, required when splice_event_cancel is false and splice_immediate is false and program_splice_flag is to be set
splice_insert.unique_program_id: uint16, required when splice_event_cancel is false

component.pts_time: uint33, required when splice_immediate is false

EVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_min: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none
EVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_max: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none

HEVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_min: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none
HEVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_max: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none

S2Xv2_satellite_delivery_system_descript.scrambling_sequence_index: uint18, required for S2Xv2_mode==2 or S2Xv2_mode==5
S2Xv2_satellite_delivery_system_descript.timeslice_number: uint8, required for S2Xv2_mode==2 or S2Xv2_mode==5

VVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_min: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none
VVC_video_descriptor.temporal_id_max: uint3, optional, specify both min and max or none

_descriptors.generic_descriptor:
Hexadecimal content.
Generic descriptor with binary payload, to be used when a specific descriptor is not yet implemented. The body of this element shall contain an even number of hexadecimal digits.

mobile_handover_info.initial_service_id: uint16, required if origin_type is NIT

stream_event_descriptor.private_text: ASCII string to be used instead of private_data
